page.title: 06A DAY IN THE LIFE OF ANDREW
page.content: This is a day in my life.I get up and go to have some breakfast.Then I go and play on my bike.I go and call for some of my friends,but none of them are playing.I decided to go and play on my computer.I had dinner next and went out again on my bike.Afterwards I went tree climbing.I crossed a bridge to get to the trees and started climbing.After clambering up a lot of trees, I went home.I had tea at about five o'clock.I went out till seven o'clock,and then came in.I watched "Street Hawk" on T.V. and went to bed at nine o'clock.
